intro: The Vior'la Tau army list lets you field a Tau army from the Vior'la Sept. The Vior'la is focused on the larger Tau Battlesuits, with support options largely restricted to other suits, und drones.
strategy: Tau Armeen haben einen Strategiewert von 3.
Initiative: XV8 Crisis Battlesuit, XV10 Heavy Battlesuit Cadres und KV128 Stormsurge und KX139 Supremacy Armour have an Initiative Rating of 1+. Alle anderen Verbände haben eine Initiativewert von 2+.
